meanings.definition: Having the texture or consistency of marrow.
meanings.sent1: The cake was so moist and marrowy, it practically melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The mud in the garden felt cold and marrowy under my bare feet.
meanings.sent3: The pillow was so soft and marrowy that it felt like sleeping on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The fabric of the blanket was thick and marrowy, providing warmth on chilly nights.
meanings.sent5: The freshly baked bread had a warm, marrowy texture that made it irresistible.
